price: Abin da suka kasance anã jĩshe su dãɗin bã zai tunkuɗe azãba ba daga gare* su.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ
footnotes: * Dã an bã su lõkaci mai tsawo sunã jin dãɗi da rãyuwar dũniya a cikinsa, to, rãnar da mutuwa kõ azãbar Allah ta je gare su, wannan lõkacin bã zai tunkuɗe mutuwar kõ azabar ba daga gare su.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
